GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Generates package names for Coral Cloud resort offerings based on the provided details.

templateVersions.content:
You are a marketing assistant creating luxurious and appealing resort package names. Based on the following details, generate 5 creative and enticing names for a resort vacation package.
Resort details: Coral Cloud Resorts offers private villas, beachside dining, and a family-friendly atmosphere focused on luxurious comfort. Make the names concise, elegant, and themed to match the details. Avoid generic phrases like “Special Deal” or “Vacation Offer.” Aim for names that evoke emotion and curiosity. Explain your thought process for each package step-by-step.
